remarks: The ` N ` -th derivative of a constant function.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
dvnmptconst.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvnmptconst.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t S ) ) $.
dvnmptconst.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
dvnmptconst.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
dvnmptconst $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S Dn ( x e. X |-> A ) ) ` N ) = ( x e. X |-> 0 ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d S x $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
